children.text:
Version 1.6.2.9

+ Bug fixes. 

+ OAUTH2 authentication for Yandex.

+ Tasker: the plugin now returns data from all matching messages, as arrays (not just one).

Version 1.6.2.5

+ A help screen for "undo instead of confirmations".

+ When using "dark with light messages" theme - the message editor is now light too.

+ Updated widget sizes ("message counters" widgets).

+ New icons and a few other touch-ups (for material theme).

+ "Muted" colors for color chips (contacts). Settings -> message list.

Version 1.6.2

+ Undo for message deletions and similar actions. Settings -> Confirmations and undo.

+ "Replace contact names", app settings -> Contacts.

+ Exchange: now possible to "accept" invites without sending a response.

+ Calendar invite previews: show other events from the invite's day. 

+ Contact images in message list widget, app settings -> widgets, defaults to enabled on Android 5.0+.

+ Message editor: new feature, background (fill) color.

+ OAUTH2 authentication for Hotmail. To switch an already existing account, check mail there once, then long press (the account) -> account setup. 

+ Made possible to cache attachments (not save) on the microSd memory card. Android 5.0+, app settings -> look and feel.

+ Conversations: made possible to combine messages by sender and subject even if otherwise unrelated. App settings -> conversations.

+ Per-folder "do not notify" setting (for incoming type folders which are set to check mail).

+ Message search "by sender only" (in addition to "by headers and text" and "by headers only").

+ Better search results performance (all messages search, smart folder search).

+ Settings -> message list -> separate settings for "when and size color", for unread and read messages.

+ Gmail: made possible for system accounts to perform OAUTH2 authentication via Google's web site, avoiding issues with Google Play Services. 

+ Per-message star indicators in message list widget, app settings -> widgets, disabled by default.

+ The message date header in message lists can be made "sticky". Settings -> Message list.

+ Expanded conversations can be sorted in reverse. Settings -> Conversations.

+ Android 6+: redesigned the screen for excluding the app from "battery optimizations".

+ Priority notifications (5.0+) now don't require vibration. 

+ New translation: Swedish (Svenska), thank you Magnus Gunnarsson.

+ Samsung Gear support can be turned off, app settings -> Message notifications.

Version 1.6.1.5

+ Improved Samsung Gear smart watch compatibility, requires official Gear app.

+ Settings -> account list -> per-folder "total" message counts (always / never / auto depending on available width).

+ Bug fixes.
Version 1.6.1.0-3

+ New search interface, now possible to search message headers only (not text).

+ Search in IMAP accounts: the app now asks the server for all matches up front (slower), but each batch of messages is fetched faster.

+ Navigation drawer in message lists now has a "quick account switch" panel. App settings -> look and feel.

+ Account images in "account switch panel". For Gmail, from your Google profile, for others, from Contacts.

+ "Recent" addresses (recipients) on the compose screen, i.e. from actual recent messages (app settings -> Contacts).

+ Per-account night / weekend settings: long press the account -> Special settings.

+ Improved automatic setup (AutoDiscover) when adding Exchange accounts.

+ Message compose: Calibri and Georgia (note: Android does not come with those fonts preinstalled, appearance may not match).

+ Settings -> message list -> "tap header to select". 

+ Settings -> message list -> "tap anywhere to select".

+ Message view: indicate SPF and DKIM status (green or red lock symbol), app settings -> message view.

+ New, more reliable, logic for "mark unread or not" when checking mail in POP3 accounts.

+ Unread counter "badge" for ASUS (4.4+).

+ Added settings -> message list -> background color for selected messages.

+ Added "reset saved sort order" in message lists (menus under Sort).

+ The new search view now supports "Paste".

+ Total unread count (app icon, widget) now excludes accounts with disabled notifications.

+ Moved "add reminder" for calendar invites (IMAP) from app settings to the invite details popup.

+ When IMAP "special" server names change (e.g. language change), try to remap to new names. 

+ Added address validation on the compose screen before sending (that the entered addresses are well formed).

+ Settings -> message view -> send read receipts without prompting.

+ Notification settings: use account color (if set) for the LED.

+ Exchange: incoming meeting invites (or changes) are synced in more expediently.

+ Exchange: attachment preload now considers already loaded messages (e.g., after switching from mobile to WiFI).

+ Settings -> Mail, other -> Mark read when archiving.

+ Backup / restore: "default account for sending", "start the app in account / folder".

+ Added settings -> composing and sending -> default text color.

+ Added "only to new messages" for greeting (already existed for for signature).

+ Added settings -> message list -> "Show sent as from self" (already existed for Smart Folder).

+ Added "Messages to cache" item in app settings, under "Mail, receiving".

Version 1.6.0.11

+ Fixed "no subject" in some messages, Android 6.

+ Other bug fixes.

Version 1.6.0.7

+ Fixed message formatting when exchanging messages with Yahoo Mail app.

+ Added a workaround for TWC / RoadRunner SSL certificate.

+ Fixed swiping between messages inside Smart Folder set to "just unread".

+ Improved the logic of "mark read" when swiping through messages sorted "unread first".

+ Fixed sent messages occasionally getting lost in Exchange accounts.

+ Translation updates, added support for "private" events in Exchange calendar sync.

Version 1.6.0.0

+ Conversations (grouping related messages).

+ Added settings -> conversations: 

- whether a change in subject means a new conversation.

- "mosaic" images for conversations.

- appearance customization.

- tap conversation to open its first message.

- "Back" to collapse.

+ Android 6 "Doze mode" handling: app settings -> mail, receiving.

+ Data compression for IMAP (Android 4.4+), long press the account -> options and folders -> IMAP options.

+ Message view: "find" in message text (Android 5.0+), in the menu.

+ New translation: Nederlands.

+ Message search: the list of results has a "panel" at the bottom to "search all loaded messages".

+ Message search: added search icon to search results view, to edit query string and search again.

+ Added settings -> message view -> mark as read -> "when closing" (to go with sorting "unread first").

+ Message position indicator in message view. To turn off, settings -> message view.

+ Action buttons in Smart Folder notifications (if all messages belong to one account).

+ Added Smart Folder time period "1 month".
